name: Black & Bruised
description:
To these guys, boxing's no game. It's a matter of survival. Nineteen outrageous characters fight their way through grueling over-the-top slugfests to win fame, fortune or respect. Play through their intertwining lives as they literally beat each other Black & Bruised!

Black & Bruised is a boxing-based fighting video game developed by Digital Fiction and published by Majesco Entertainment in 2003 in the USA; in the PAL regions such as Europe and Australia it was published by VU Games.
